name: Banana
description: Eats a banana for 10% HP heal.

name: Focus
description: Increases all accuracy by 15% for all moves done this turn.

name: Flame Whip
description: Spins and does fire damage. 15% chance of inflicting Burn.

name: Infernal Takedown
description: Flies and dives into opponent. 50% chance of inflicted burn to all opposing mons.

name: Bubble Barrier
description: Summons a barrier that blocks the first offensive move used on this mon. Also removes the burn effect.
